location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 1307 of 1826 from William Newnham, Secretary to the Governor of Bombay, Bombay Castle, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf at Bushire [Ephraim Gerrish Stannus]

mods.abstract: William Newnham acknowledges receipt of the Resident's despatch no. 67, dated 26 October, reporting his visit to the Arabian Coast in relation to the removal of the Soedan [SuwaydƒÅn] tribe from Deruh [?]. The letter expresses the satisfaction of the Governor regarding these measures.
